long_description: Perfectly suited to 3 car campers, the Ticla Tortuga 3 Tent combines handsome architecture with full views (even during rain storms), kid- and dog-friendly durability and a spacious floor plan. Rainfly provides excellent coverage without compromising views or ventilation. Strong and smooth shock-corded aluminum poles withstand the elements. Fits in a 10 x 15 ft. space, making it perfect for festivals and small campsites. The Ticla Tortuga 3 Tent comes with a special storage tote that makes it easy to unpack and repack the tent-no more tedious stuffing!
short_description: Perfectly suited to 3 car campers, the Ticla Tortuga 3 Tent combines handsome architecture with full views (even during rain storms), kid- and dog-friendly durability and a spacious floor plan.
